Module com.alike
Package com.alike.graphical

Class HilbertFractalCurveAnimator

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
com.alike.graphical.HilbertFractalCurveAnimator
public class HilbertFractalCurveAnimator extends javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
Animates a Hilbert fractal curve generated inside a @code{HilbertFractalCurveSolver} onto a java fx canvas.

  • Constructor Details

    • HilbertFractalCurveAnimator

      public HilbertFractalCurveAnimator(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas, HilbertFractalCurveSolver hfcs) throws NonSquareCanvasException
      Used to construct a new @code{HilbertFractalCurveAnimator} object.
      Parameters:
      canvas - The canvas on which to animate.
      hfcs - The Hilbert solver containing the path we want to draw.
      Throws:
      NonSquareCanvasException - Thrown if the canvas is not a square and of side length a power of two.

      Throws:
